alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 11:48AM EST until March 05 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Recent heavy rainfall will continue to cause rises on the Patoka River through the weekend, with an expected crest on Monday. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY, MARCH 05... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Saturday, March 05. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.8 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, March 05. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
